/usr/bin/c++   -O2 -g -DNDEBUG    CMakeFiles/chapter02.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter02.dir/scenesubroutine.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter02.dir/scenediffuse.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter02.dir/scenetwoside.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter02.dir/sceneflat.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter02.dir/scenediscard.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter02.dir/sceneads.cpp.o  -o chapter02 -rdynamic ../ingredients/libingredients.a /usr/local/lib/libglfw3.a -lGL -lpthread -lXrandr -lXxf86vm -lXi -lrt
